subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Another radio conversion.
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Wow you are finding deals left and right on the parts now! I am always looking at things wondering if it would work for you hehehe I still have that one sittin in a box if you want it I think its just the antenna havin a problem. It sweeps fine.

Misty


--- On Sat, 8/30/08, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

> From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Another radio conversion.
> To: "Group" <evp-itc@yahoogroups.com>
> Date: Saturday, August 30, 2008, 1:53 PM
> I picked this Trutech AM/FM/CD/Cassette Recorder up
> yesterday for $5. Made in 2006. The FM, and tape deck were
> not working, but they are now. I added a voltage regulator
> for a manual tune control that I am using here. I'll add
> the sweep board later on. The adavnatoage to these is
> pre-existing sound amplifiers, that saves $$ and time.  
> Frank-S

> featured posts.
